projects.name: Someday
projects.description: An end to end, team management app inspired by "Monday", leverages several technologies including Vue JS, MongoDB and Node JS to provide a seamless user experience.

projects.name: Musicay
projects.description: An audio streaming app inspired by Spotify, built with ReactJs, MongoDB and Node JS.

projects.name: AppSus
projects.description: An "all in one" app including: mail, notes and 2 digital book shops inspired by Gmail and Google Keep, built with Vue JS.
